UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile which is created when they sign up.

photoURL.description: URL for the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

Feedback.title: User Feedback
Feedback.description: Represents feedback submitted by a user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the feedback was submitted.

uid.description: The ID of the user who submitted the feedback.

Agent.title: AI Agent
Agent.description: Represents an AI automation agent created by a user.

description.description: A short description of the agent's purpose.

tasks.description: A list of tasks or actions the agent performs.

status.description: The current status of the agent (e.g., 'active', 'inactive').

tasksCompleted.description: The total number of tasks completed by the agent.

lastRun.description: The timestamp of when the agent was last run.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the agent was created.

uid.description: The ID of the user who owns this agent.

isPublic.description: If true, this agent is listed in the public App Store.

downloads.description: How many times this agent has been downloaded from the App Store.

avatar.description: An identifier for the agent's avatar image.

authorDisplayName.description: The display name of the agent's original creator.

authorPhotoURL.description: URL for the original creator's profile picture.

originalAgentId.description: If downloaded, the ID of the agent it was copied from.

LogEntry.title: Agent Execution Log
LogEntry.description: Represents a single log entry for an action performed by an agent.

uid.description: The ID of the user who owns the agent.

agentId.description: The ID of the agent that performed the action.

taskName.description: The name of the task/action that was executed.

status.description: The result of the action execution.

details.description: Details about the execution, like an error message or success confirmation.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the action was executed.

/agents/{agentId}.description: Stores AI agent configurations created by users.

/logs/{logId}.description: Stores execution logs for all agent actions.
